mapper.select: select v.vid,v.vname,v.vCount,v.vAcount,v.vBeginDate,v.vPhone,v.vstate,v.vidc,v.vState,v.vSum,t.vDiscount,t.vGrade,t.vDisplay from vip v left join vtype t on v.vidc=t.vIdc limit #{begin},#{end}
select v.vSum,t.vLimit from vip v,vtype t where v.vIdc = t.vIdc and vid = #{id}

select v.vName,v.vCount,vAcount,t.vGrade,vDisplay,b.vBalance,o.oDate,o.oPrice from vbills b left join vip v on b.vid=v.vid left join vType t on b.vidc = t.vidc left join orders o on v.vPhone=o.vPhone 1=1
and v.vName like concat('%',concat(#{vName},'%'))
and v.vCount like concat('%',concat(#{vCount},'%'))
order by o.oDate desc limit #{begin},#{end}
select vAcount,vSum from vip where vid = #{id}
mapper.update: update vip set vAcount=#{vAcount},vSum=#{vSum} where vid = #{vid}

UPDATE vip v,vtype t SET v.vIdc = CASE WHEN v.vSum < (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 2) THEN '1' WHEN v.vSum >= (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 2) and v.vSum < (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 3) THEN '2' WHEN v.vSum >= (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 3) and v.vSum < (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 4) THEN '3' WHEN v.vSum >= (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 4) and v.vSum < (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 5) THEN '4' WHEN v.vSum >= (select vLimit from vtype where vIdc = 5) THEN '5' END
